sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app>
        <v-card>
            <v-card-title class="title-card">LISTE DES COMPAGNIES
                <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                <v-btn color="primary" height="30px"><v-icon>mdi-plus</v-icon>Nouvelle Compagnie</v-btn>
               
            </v-card-title>
            <v-data-table
                :page="page"
                :pageCount="numberOfPages"
                :headers="headers"
                :items="compagnieTransportList"
                :options.sync="options"
                :server-items-length="totalComagniesTransport"
                :loading="loading"
                :search="search"
            ></v-data-table>
        </v-card>
    </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import axios from "axios"
import { API_RECUPERER_LISTE_COMPAGNIE_TRANSPORT } from '../globalConfig/globalConstConfig'
export default {
    name:'SelectionnerCompagnieTransport',
    data(){
        return{
            page: 0,
            totalComagniesTransport: 0,
            numberOfPages: 0,
            loading: true,
            options: {
                index : 0,
                size : 8
            },
            search : '',
            compagnieTransportList : [],
            headers:[
                {text : 'reference' , value : 'id'},
                {text : 'Designation' , value : 'designation'},
                {text : 'Status' , value : 'statusActuel'},
                {text : 'Actions' , value : 'actions' , sortable : false}
            ]
        }
    },

    methods :{
        editCompagnieTransport(){},


        // RECUPERER LA LISTE DE TOUTES LES COMPAGNIES EN ATTENTES
        readAllCompagniesTransportFromApi(){
            axios.post(API_RECUPERER_LISTE_COMPAGNIE_TRANSPORT , this.options ).then((response) => {
                this.loading = false;
                this.compagnieTransportList = response.data.items;
                this.totalComagniesTransport = response.data.items.length;
                this.numberOfPages = response.data.count;
                console.log(response)
            })
        }   
    },

    mounted(){
        this.readAllCompagniesTransportFromApi()
    }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
    .title-card{
        font-weight: bold;
        color: black;
        font-size: 17px;
    }
</style>
